description: Lower triangular matrix T = Pascal lower triangular matrix divided on the left by its entry-square.
comments: Reference is a solution to a problem of I. Gessel.
references: "Inverse of a Combinatorial Matrix", Dave Callan, American Mathematical Monthly, Vol. 95 (1988), pp. 770-771.
formula: T=Inverse matrix of {a_ij}:{binomial(i, j)*binomial(j, j-i)}=[ A008459 ]^(-1)*[ A007318 ]
author: _Len Smiley_
